Html:
Any chance of an AACFileReader class as like MP3FileReader?

I'd like to process an AAC file via frames. I have yet to find solid info regarding the acc format, I assume it is similar to MP3 frames.
At a glance I dont see a ReadNextFrame() function in MediaFoundationReader but I'll look into how MediaFoundationReader works. Basically I need to cut an ACC file at a lossless frame level.
No, I'd need full documentation on ACC to be able to parse it, which is something I simply don't have. MediaFoundationReader will convert to PCM
Ok no worries. I know it is possible and if I figure it out I'll submit the class. Surely it cant be too different to MP3 frames.
